meanings.definition: The state or quality of being familiar.
meanings.sent1: The familiarnesses of the old house made me feel at ease.
meanings.sent2: Her familiarnesses with the neighborhood helped her find her way easily.
meanings.sent3: The cat's familiarnesses with the new toy was evident by how quickly it started playing with it.
meanings.sent4: The familiarnesses of the song brought back memories of childhood.
meanings.sent5: The familiarnesses of his voice made it easy to recognize him in the crowd.

meanings.definition: The degree to which something is known or recognized.
meanings.sent1: The familiarnesses of the logo made it instantly recognizable.
meanings.sent2: Her familiarnesses with the subject helped her ace the test.
meanings.sent3: The familiarnesses of the actor's face made everyone in the room gasp.
meanings.sent4: The familiarnesses of the scent brought back memories of her childhood home.
meanings.sent5: The familiarnesses of the melody made it easy to hum along.

meanings.definition: The feeling of being comfortable or well-acquainted with someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The familiarnesses of her presence put me at ease.
meanings.sent2: His familiarnesses with the routine made him feel secure.
meanings.sent3: The familiarnesses of the old chair made it hard to part with.
meanings.sent4: The familiarnesses of the book felt like revisiting an old friend.
meanings.sent5: The familiarnesses of the town brought back memories of childhood adventures.
